forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
Dawn breaks gently over Downtown San Francisco, a city still caught in the embrace of a marine layer that whispers of drizzles past. The day hints at a shift—behind the curtain of clouds, the sun awaits its cue. As temperatures hover around a cool 64 degrees, the bay’s subtle chill nudges you toward layers, urging a light jacket or a soft sweater to ward off the brisk westward winds. The occasional gust, playful yet determined, carries with it the scent of the ocean as well as the promise of clearer skies by afternoon.

Throughout the day, the fog will gradually recede, revealing the city’s iconic structures framed against a backdrop of intermittent sunshine. With a 20% chance of precipitation lingering in the air, it's wise to carry an umbrella—just in case. As evening approaches, clouds will blanket the horizon, and the coolness will settle again, making a cozy, quiet dinner quite appealing. Perhaps you will find a spot with a view, allowing you to revel in the shimmer of lights reflecting on the water while the city hums its evening lullaby.
